summary: An outrageous, affectionate look at coming of age in the Eisenhower era in Brooklyn.
cast: Richard Romanus|David Proval|Jesse Welles|Tina Romanus|Danny Wells|Larry Bishop|Tabi Cooper|Juno Dawson|Shirley Jo Finney|Martin Garner|Terry Haven|Allen Joseph|Bernie Massa|Gelsa Palao|Paul Roman|Philip Michael Thomas|Frank DeKova|Angelo Grisanti|Candy Candido|Ed Peck|Lillian Adams|Mary Dean Lauria|Donna Ponterotto|Vincent Di Paolo|Chris Eann|Charles Gordone|Derrel Maury
title: Hey Good Lookin'
